subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Miguel Cabrera comes to the plate, even his Detroit teammates are mesmerized. “On an almost nightly basis, he does something that makes his peers go, ‘Wow,’ ” said one player.
snippet: When Miguel Cabrera comes to the plate, even his Detroit teammates are mesmerized. “On an almost nightly basis, he does something that makes his peers go, ‘Wow,’ ” said one player.
